channel.title: Noah Baumbach on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Noah Baumbach on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly’ Review: George Clooney Plays a Version of Himself in Noah Baumbach’s Lightly Diverting but Overly Soft Inside-Hollywood Drama
item.description: “Jay Kelly” is movie that takes a “hard” look at stardom yet has a soft center. As a character study, it wants to examine a celebrity who’s soulful and charismatic enough to be played by George Cloone

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly’ Review: George Clooney Plays a Version of Himself in Noah Baumbach’s Lightly Diverting but Overly Soft Inside-Hollywood Drama

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly’ Review: George Clooney Plays the Movie Star but Adam Sandler Shines Brightest in Noah Baumbach’s Sentimental Comedy-Drama
item.description: Laura Dern, Riley Keough and Patrick Wilson also appear in the Venice-premiering Netflix film about a world-famous actor and his longtime manager reassessing their priorities.

item.title: ‘Jay Kelly’ Review: George Clooney Plays the Movie Star but Adam Sandler Shines Brightest in Noah Baumbach’s Sentimental Comedy-Drama
item.description: Laura Dern, Riley Keough and Patrick Wilson also appear in the Venice-premiering Netflix film about a world-famous actor and his longtime manager reassessing their priorities.

item.title: George Clooney Scales Back Venice Itinerary as He’s Feeling Under the Weather at Start of Festival
item.description: According to multiple sources close to ‘Jay Kelly’ and its press schedule, Clooney started to feel unwell Wednesday and was advised to head straight home and rest up ahead of a packed Thursday.

item.title: Venice: David Rooney’s Top 10 Must-See Titles
item.description: As the world’s oldest film festival gears up for its 82nd edition, THR’s chief film critic surveys the Lido lineup, with new movies from Luca Guadagnino, Guillermo del Toro, Benny Safdie, Park Chan-Wo
